creator: ks13581@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 31794
filter doesn't work

1. Add Thread Group
2. Add Recording Controller to Thread Group
3. Add Test Script Recorder to WorkBench
4. Add regular expression to URL patterns to exclude field 
.*\.(bmp|css|js|gif|ico|jpe?g|png|swf|woff)
5. Start recording

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello,
Most probably the request for JS includes a parameter , something like:
.../home.js?version=221ZZZ1

So you need to rework the regexp.

First ask on user mailing list then if issue is confirmed reopen this issue.

Regards

creator: ks13581@gmail.com
text:
Hello!
Problem isn't in regexp.
It is shown in the attach.

For example,

URL pattern to exclude .*\.(bmp|css|js|gif|ico|jpeg|png|swf|woff)

Path 
js.st.klumba.ua/static/js/common/home.js  and other (it's shown in attach)

doesn't excludes

I tested on the mentionned website and as I said in previous comment it is working.
With default regexp, exclusion of css and js is not working because URL are like this:
XXXXX/home.js?v=3

So you just need to modify regexp to this:
.*\.(bmp|css|js|gif|ico|jpe?g|png|swf|woff)(.*)

And exclusion will occur.

Next time please ask first on mailing list.
Regards
Philippe M.
@philmdot
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
